Class DefaultTupleDocumentConverter

java.lang.Object
  com.datasalt.pangool.solr.DefaultTupleDocumentConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
TupleDocumentConverter, Serializable
public class DefaultTupleDocumentConverter
extends Object
implements TupleDocumentConverter

This default TupleDocumentConverter maps a ITuple to a SolrInputDocument using primitive Schema.Field types.
